alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Lost River Valleys (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 16 at 12:21PM MDT until further notice by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Flood Watch is extended for the following rivers in Idaho... Big Lost River at Howell Ranch near Chilly affecting Lost River Valley and Big Lost Highlands/Copper Basin zones. Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Big Lost River Howell Ranch near Chill 4.1 2.9 Tue 12 pm MD 3.3 3.6 3.8 &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. IDZ068-074-172200- /O.EXT.KPIH.FL.A.0002.230520T1909Z-000000T0000Z/ /HWRI1.0.SM.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.NR/ 1221 PM MDT Tue May 16 2023 ...FLOOD WATCH FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Big Lost River at Howell Ranch near Chilly. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 4.1 feet, Widespread lowland flooding from Howell Ranch downriver to the top of Mackay Reservoir. Fish Hatchery Road near Donahue Ranch may have water flowing over it. Canals and headgates may have problems. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM MDT Tuesday the stage was 2.9 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 4.1 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Lost River Valleys
